translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾分増えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had somewhat increased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の小部隊や野良モンスター、時には野盗……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Small units of the demon army, wild monsters, and sometimes bandits...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらを、辛うじて切り抜けてきた証だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was proof that she had barely managed to get through them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類圏までは……もう少し、か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just a little further to the human territory..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日、夜通し歩けばなんとか、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I walk through the night today, somehow..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己を叱咤し、セシルは引きずるように足を動かす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chiding herself, Cecil dragged her feet forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （大丈夫……私は、大丈夫、だ、っ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I'm okay... I'm okay... )

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類圏に戻り、再び戦う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She would return to the human territory and fight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人は手強いが、退くわけにはいかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons were formidable, but she could not retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敗北しようと、地にまみれようと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if defeated, even if covered in dirt...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身体を、汚されようとも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if her body was sullied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （彼が……っ、戻る、までは…………！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Until he... returns...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと、足が止まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, her feet stopped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前に、人影があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of her was a human figure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分のものではない、影が。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A shadow that was not hers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アリオス……ッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Arios...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めは、幻覚かと思った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, she thought it was a hallucination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱さが見せる、気の迷いかと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She thought it was a delusion caused by her weakness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、そうではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it was not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに、勇者アリオス・テオマンは、そこにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sure enough, the hero Arios Teoman was there.
"...Cecil."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名を呼ぶ声音も、記憶のまま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His voice calling her name was just as she remembered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは思わずこぼれた大粒の涙を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil involuntarily let fall large tears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて拭った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and quickly wiped them away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「久し、ぶり……だ、ずいぶんと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been a long... long time... quite a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一呼吸足らずの間に熱くなっていく顔に羞恥を覚え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling embarrassed as her face flushed in less than a breath,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは視線を足下に落とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil lowered her gaze to her feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸にこみ上げてくるものが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What welled up in her chest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 舌から言葉を奪っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: robbing her tongue of words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再会した時はなんと言ってやろうかと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had thought over and over about what to say when they met again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度も考えたのに、何も出てこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no matter how much she thought, nothing came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの時……あの時、君が言ったように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At that time... just as you said then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君が来るまで、守ったぞ。自由都市を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I protected it until you came. The Free City..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、絞り出せたのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, the words she could squeeze out were...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルをずうっと支えていた、遠い日の約束だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A promise from long ago that had supported Cecil all along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あまり……胸を張れる戦況ではないが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not exactly a battle to be proud of,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、君が来てくれたなら、今回も……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it's okay, if you came, this time too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ…………っ、会い、たかった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I wanted to see you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All this time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 縋りつきたくなるような真情と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Words filled with a desperate sincere emotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥じらう気持ちが絡み合った言葉を、吐き出して。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: mixed with feelings of embarrassment, poured out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、ようやく…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, finally...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは、その場の冷えた気配に気がついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil noticed the cold atmosphere in the place.
"Arios...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者は、じっと、セシルを見据えたまま……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero stared fixedly at Cecil and...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
